tasks.label: Compile + Run (.87)
args: ssh cfdlab-ib${input:nodeFor87} 'cd /home/chenpengchung/D3Q27_PeriodicHill && nvcc main.cu -arch=sm_35 -I/home/chenpengchung/openmpi-3.0.3/include -L/home/chenpengchung/openmpi-3.0.3/lib -lmpi -o a.out && nohup mpirun -np ${input:gpuCount} ./a.out > log$(date +%Y%m%d) 2>&1 &'

tasks.label: Compile + Run (.154)
args: ssh cfdlab-ib${input:nodeFor154} 'cd /home/chenpengchung/D3Q27_PeriodicHill && nvcc main.cu -arch=sm_35 -I/home/chenpengchung/openmpi-3.0.3/include -L/home/chenpengchung/openmpi-3.0.3/lib -lmpi -o a.out && nohup mpirun -np ${input:gpuCount} ./a.out > log$(date +%Y%m%d) 2>&1 &'

tasks.label: Check Running Jobs (.87)
args: ssh cfdlab-ib${input:nodeFor87} 'ps aux | grep a.out | grep -v grep'

tasks.label: Check Running Jobs (.154)
args: ssh cfdlab-ib${input:nodeFor154} 'ps aux | grep a.out | grep -v grep'
